summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 8th Avenue North, from McGraw Street to Halladay Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9123 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
